# loss_cosine_proximity

## (Deprecated) loss_cosine_proximity

## Description
`loss_cosine_proximity` is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. It has been renamed to `loss_cosine_similarity`(). 


## Usage
```r
loss_cosine_proximity(...) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| ... | passed on to `loss_cosine_similarity()` |
